trans-unit.source: Provides methods to serialize and deserialize tracking profiles into and from XML documents by using the tracking profile XML schema definition (XSD).
trans-unit.target: 使用追蹤設定檔 XML 結構描述定義 (XSD) 提供將追蹤設定檔序列化為 XML 文件，以及從 XML 文件將追蹤設定檔還原序列化的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> uses the tracking profile XSD contained in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Schema%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to serialize <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> objects into valid XML documents and to deserialize valid XML documents into <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> 使用包含在 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Schema%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 中的追蹤設定檔 XSD 將 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> 物件序列化為有效的 XML 文件，以及將有效的 XML 文件還原序列化為 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> performs validation during both serialization and deserialization and, if necessary, throws an appropriate exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> 會在序列化和還原序列化期間執行驗證，並視需要擲回適當的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: An XML document provides a convenient format in which to store a tracking profile.
trans-unit.target: XML 文件提供儲存追蹤設定檔的方便格式。

trans-unit.source: It also provides a non-programmatic way of authoring tracking profiles.
trans-unit.target: 它也提供撰寫追蹤設定檔的非程式設計方法。

trans-unit.source: The out-of-box <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> uses a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> to serialize and deserialize the tracking profiles that are stored in its database.
trans-unit.target: 全新的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> 會使用 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> 來序列化和還原序列化儲存在其資料庫中的追蹤設定檔。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how you can create a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> using the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.%23ctor%2A> constructor to serialize a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何使用 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> 建構函式建立 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.%23ctor%2A> 以序列化 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>。

trans-unit.source: The code also uses the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Serialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼也會使用 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Serialize%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Query using SQLTrackingService SDK sample from the Program.cs file.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是 Program.cs 檔案中＜使用 SQLTrackingService 查詢 SDK＞範例的一部分。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Query Using SQLTrackingService](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a81e48bb-12f4-4e2b-9176-ea4e6b6e3d21).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[查詢使用 SQLTrackingService](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a81e48bb-12f4-4e2b-9176-ea4e6b6e3d21)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how you can create a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> using the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.%23ctor%2A> constructor to serialize a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何使用 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> 建構函式建立 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.%23ctor%2A> 以序列化 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>。

trans-unit.source: The code also uses the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Serialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼也會使用 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Serialize%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Query using SQLTrackingService SDK sample from the Program.cs file.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是 Program.cs 檔案中＜使用 SQLTrackingService 查詢 SDK＞範例的一部分。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Query Using SQLTrackingService](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a81e48bb-12f4-4e2b-9176-ea4e6b6e3d21).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[查詢使用 SQLTrackingService](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a81e48bb-12f4-4e2b-9176-ea4e6b6e3d21)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> that contains an XML document.
trans-unit.target: 包含 XML 文件的 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" />。

trans-unit.source: Deserializes the XML document that is contained in the text reader by using the tracking profile XML Schema definition (XSD).
trans-unit.target: 使用追蹤設定檔 XML 結構描述定義 (XSD) 還原序列化包含在文字閱讀器中的 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile" /> that contains the deserialized tracking profile.
trans-unit.target: 包含還原序列化的追蹤設定檔的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile" />。

trans-unit.source: Deserialization refers to the process of creating an object from a well-formed XML document.
trans-unit.target: 還原序列化指的是從格式正確的 XML 文件建立物件的程序。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Deserialize%2A> uses the tracking profile XSD contained in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Schema%2A> to deserialize the XML document that is contained in the text reader into a valid <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Deserialize%2A> 會使用包含在 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Schema%2A> 中的追蹤設定檔 XSD，將包含在文字讀取器中的 XML 文件還原序列化為有效的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>。

trans-unit.source: Validation on the XML document is performed during deserialization, and, if the document is not valid, a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 還原序列化期間會在 XML 文件上執行驗證，如果文件無效，則擲回 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException>。

trans-unit.source: You can catch this exception and examine <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException.ValidationEventArgs%2A> to determine the cause of the validation error.
trans-unit.target: 您可以捕捉此例外狀況，並檢查 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException.ValidationEventArgs%2A> 以判斷驗證錯誤的原因。

trans-unit.source: If there are any unhandled exceptions while deserializing the tracking profile then the workflow instance for which the tracking profile was requested will be terminated.
trans-unit.target: 如果在還原序列化追蹤設定檔的期間有任何未處理的例外狀況，將終止要求追蹤設定檔的工作流程執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If you want to perform validation without deserializing the XML representation of a tracking profile, you can write your own tracking profile validator.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要執行驗證，但不還原序列化追蹤設定檔的 XML 表示法，您可以寫入您自己的追蹤設定檔驗證程式。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Schema%2A> property for more information.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Schema%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="reader" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="reader" /> 為 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="reader" /> does not contain a document that conforms to the tracking profile XSD.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="reader" /> 不包含符合追蹤設定檔 XSD 的文件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the tracking profile XML schema definition (XSD).
trans-unit.target: 取得追蹤設定檔 XML 結構描述定義 (XSD)。

trans-unit.source: The tracking profile XSD.
trans-unit.target: 追蹤設定檔 XSD。

trans-unit.source: This property exposes the tracking profile XSD used by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> to perform serialization and deserialization of a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性會公開 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> 用於執行 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> 的序列化和還原序列化的追蹤設定檔 XSD。

trans-unit.source: You may also use this property to get the tracking profile XSD in order to write your own validator for tracking profiles.
trans-unit.target: 您也可使用此屬性取得追蹤設定檔 XSD 以寫入您自己用於追蹤設定檔的驗證程式。

trans-unit.source: For example, you may want to do this in order to validate XML representations of tracking profiles without performing deserialization.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可能想要執行此動作以驗證追蹤設定檔的 XML 表示法，而且不執行還原序列化。

trans-unit.source: A valid <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile" />.
trans-unit.target: 有效的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile" />。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> that holds the XML document.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法傳回時，包含存有 XML 文件的 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: The parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 參數是以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

trans-unit.source: Serializes the tracking profile into an XML document by using the tracking profile XML Schema definition (XSD).
trans-unit.target: 使用追蹤設定檔 XML 結構描述定義 (XSD) 將追蹤設定檔序列化為 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: Serialization refers to the process of creating a well-formed XML document from a valid <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: 序列化是指從有效的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> 建立格式正確的 XML 文件的程序。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Serialize%2A> uses the tracking profile <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Schema%2A> to serialize the tracking profile.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Serialize%2A> 會使用追蹤設定檔 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Schema%2A>，將追蹤設定檔序列化。

trans-unit.source: `profile` must be a valid <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> that contains at least one valid track point.
trans-unit.target: `profile` 必須是有效的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>，包含至少一個有效的追蹤點。

trans-unit.source: Validation on the tracking profile is performed during serialization, and, if the tracking profile is not valid, an <xref:System.ArgumentException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 序列化期間會在追蹤設定檔上執行驗證，如果追蹤設定檔無效，則擲回 <xref:System.ArgumentException>。

trans-unit.source: You can catch this exception and examine its message property to determine the cause of the validation error.
trans-unit.target: 您可以捕捉此例外狀況，並檢查它的訊息屬性以判斷驗證錯誤的原因。

trans-unit.source: If there are any unhandled exceptions while serializing the tracking profile, then the workflow instance for which the tracking profile was requested is terminated.
trans-unit.target: 如果在序列化追蹤設定檔的期間有任何未處理的例外狀況，將終止要求追蹤設定檔的工作流程執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how you can create a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> using the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.%23ctor%2A> constructor to serialize a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何使用 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> 建構函式建立 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.%23ctor%2A> 以序列化 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>。

trans-unit.source: The code also uses the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Serialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼也會使用 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Serialize%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Query using SQLTrackingService SDK sample from the Program.cs file.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是 Program.cs 檔案中＜使用 SQLTrackingService 查詢 SDK＞範例的一部分。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Query Using SQLTrackingService](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a81e48bb-12f4-4e2b-9176-ea4e6b6e3d21).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[查詢使用 SQLTrackingService](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a81e48bb-12f4-4e2b-9176-ea4e6b6e3d21)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="profile" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="profile" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="writer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="writer" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="profile" /> is not a valid tracking profile.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="profile" /> 不是有效的追蹤設定檔。
